message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the money will depreciate faster for me.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Let's split it evenly this time.  It's getting too late in the game, and neither of us wants to be left with worthless money.
